content:
This chunk introduces a comprehensive list of executables available in the /bin/ folder of Panda3D, detailing their purposes and functions. The context situates it as an introductory section that provides an overview of various tools for model conversion, texture manipulation, performance analysis, and more, with each executable offering detailed help via the -h argument.

Context: This chunk serves as an introduction to a comprehensive list of executables in the /bin/ folder of Panda3D, detailing their purposes and functions. It explains that users can get detailed information about each executable by running them with the -h argument.

List of Panda3D Executables

This is meant to be a list of the executables in the /bin/ folder of Panda3D. You can get a detailed synopsis of what the executables do by running them with -h as the argument.
